title: Stunning Scenery in Cross Stitch
features: is a collection of landscapes from around the globe in cross-stitch. It is not always easy to convey in cross-stitch our world’s natural beauty, but this book brings you some of our planet's most stunning scenery. Easy-to-follow color charts and a color pattern key for each project make this book a useful addition to every design library.
description: is a freelance needlecraft designer who has been published regularly in magazines and books worldwide.
